kv3.10:3.1: ☑ Nanu asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlaṃ, atthi devesu saṃvaroti?
kv3.10:3.3: Atthi devesu asaṃvaro, yamhā asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlanti?
kv3.10:4.2: Hañci asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlaṃ, atthi devesu saṃvaro, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv3.10:4.3: “atthi devesu asaṃvaro, yamhā asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlan”ti.
kv3.10:4.6: ‘asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlaṃ, atthi devesu saṃvaro’, no ca vattabbe—
kv3.10:4.7: ‘atthi devesu asaṃvaro, yamhā asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlan’”ti micchā.
kv3.10:5.2: “atthi devesu asaṃvaro, yamhā asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlan”ti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv3.10:5.5: “vattabbe kho ‘asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlaṃ, atthi devesu saṃvaro’, no ca vattabbe—
kv3.10:5.6: ‘atthi devesu asaṃvaro, yamhā asaṃvarā saṃvaro sīlan’”ti micchā.
kv3.10:6.1: ☑ Atthi manussesu saṃvaro, atthi tattha asaṃvaroti?
kv3.10:6.3: Atthi devesu saṃvaro, atthi tattha asaṃvaroti?
kv3.10:7.1: ☑ Atthi devesu saṃvaro, natthi tattha asaṃvaroti?
kv3.10:7.3: Atthi manussesu saṃvaro, natthi tattha asaṃvaroti?
kv3.10:12.1: ☑ Atthi manussesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, atthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:12.3: Atthi devesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, atthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:13.1: ☑ Atthi manussesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, atthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:13.3: Atthi devesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, atthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:14.1: ☑ Atthi devesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, natthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:14.3: Atthi manussesu pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, natthi tattha pāṇātipātoti?
kv3.10:15.1: ☑ Atthi devesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, natthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:15.3: Atthi manussesu surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇi, natthi tattha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānanti?
kv3.10:16.3: Sabbe devā pāṇātipātino adinnādāyino kāmesumicchācārino musāvādino surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyinoti?
